name: Moonstone Crystals
description: A cluster of glowing moonstones nestled in a bed of soft, velvety moss. As you approach, the crystals begin to hum with an ethereal energy, as if attuning themselves to your presence.

name: Grotto Journal
description: An old, leather-bound journal filled with cryptic notes and sketches of the grotto's secrets. The pages seem to be written in a code that only reveals itself under the soft light of the moonstones.
